plot: A crown princess works incognito for the embassy of her country in Berlin where she fells in love with a gardener who does not know who she is. As the affair blows up two lovers and one kingdom have to make the right decision.
title: Eine Prinzessin zum Verlieben
plot_es: A crown princess works incognito for the embassy of her country in Berlin where she fells in love with a gardener who does not know who she is. As the affair blows up two lovers and one kingdom have to make the right decision.
plot_en: A crown princess works incognito for the embassy of her country in Berlin where she fells in love with a gardener who does not know who she is. As the affair blows up two lovers and one kingdom have to make the right decision.
